description: This file is a Java source file defining a REST controller named HelloController, which provides basic API endpoints such as welcome message, docs redirect, health check, and app info for a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller that handles basic API endpoints including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message as a plain string.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI URL, preserving the request's original scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns a string with application information.
